content:
Če lahko kdo pomaga,

Imam Excel 2010, želim naprintati npr. 100 kopij obrazca, ki bi bili pri printanju oštevilčeni po vrsti, torej od 1 do 100, ali od 123 do 185 itd. 
V eni celici na obrazcu bi imel pač sprintano vrstno številko lista, sedaj to delam na roke. 

Prosim
author: Izbrisan uporabnik #9334

content:
ali tukaj:

	

	
		
			
				
					
						
					
				
			
			
				
					
						Add counter and print function
					
				

				I have an excel sheet that I need to print a total of 1000 times but each time it prints I would like the value of one of the cells to count (from 000 to 999) and then print.  In other words, each time it prints it would change that cell value by adding one and then printing.  Sort of like...

				
					
						
							
						
					
					www.mrexcel.com
author: kajote
